about.title: About GAHQ
about.description1: With over 30 years in the construction industry and more than $200 million in completed development projects across the Greater Montreal area, GAHQ was built on deep roots in Quebec's residential and commercial property sectors. We've worked throughout the North Shore, South Shore, West Island, and everywhere in between.
about.description2: GAHQ was born from what we kept seeing: homeowners overwhelmed by basic repairs, unsure where to turn for honest advice, and stuck in endless contractor runarounds. We knew there had to be a better way — one that made homeownership easier, not harder.
about.description3: That's why we created GAHQ: a platform that connects you with a trusted network of certified contractors, reliable service providers, and insurance claims experts. When you become a member, you gain access to this entire ecosystem.
about.description4: Our team includes licensed building professionals, AMF-certified insurance advisors, and specialists in home damage assessment, post-sinister repairs, and claim negotiations. Whether you need help filing an insurance claim, managing renovations, or just keeping your home in shape, we're here to support you — with integrity, efficiency, and the knowledge that comes from decades on the ground.

damageRepairRebuild.title: Disaster Restoration Services
damageRepairRebuild.description: Professional damage repair and rebuild services for residential and commercial properties across Quebec. Our certified contractors ensure quality restoration work that meets insurance requirements and building codes.

waterDamage.title: Water Damage Restoration
waterDamage.description: Complete water damage restoration including extraction, drying, and repair services.

fireDamage.title: Fire & Smoke Damage
fireDamage.description: Professional fire and smoke damage restoration with certified contractors.

stormDamage.title: Storm Damage Repair
stormDamage.description: Emergency storm damage repair and structural restoration services.

certified.title: Certified Contractors
certified.description: All our contractors are licensed, insured, and certified.

insurance.title: Insurance Coordination
insurance.description: We work directly with your insurance company to streamline the process.

quality.title: Quality Guarantee
quality.description: All work is guaranteed and meets Quebec building standards.

disasterRestoration.title: Disaster Restoration Services
disasterRestoration.description1: Let's face it — when your home or rental property is damaged, managing repairs shouldn't become your full-time job. GAHQ offers full-service damage insurance repair solutions across Quebec, specializing in both residential and commercial property restoration. Whether you're dealing with water damage, smoke and fire restoration, wind or hail damage, flood cleanup, or roof leaks, our certified contractors are ready to step in quickly and professionally.
disasterRestoration.description2: We coordinate with your insurer, provide accurate insurance repair estimates, and handle everything from emergency board-ups and debris removal to structural rebuilding and finishing work. Our licensed builders, electricians, plumbers, and roofing professionals are vetted, insured, and familiar with Quebec's building codes — ensuring your repairs meet both insurance policy requirements and provincial regulations.
disasterRestoration.description3: If you're overwhelmed by managing timelines, multiple quotes, or conflicting contractor opinions, GAHQ is your single point of contact. We reduce project delays, avoid cost overruns, and give you a dedicated claims repair project manager to ensure quality from start to finish.
disasterRestoration.description4: Whether you're a homeowner, property manager, or business owner, GAHQ is here to help you get your property back to normal as quickly and efficiently as possible.

question1.questions: What kind of insurance claims can GAHQ help with?
question1.answers: We support damage-related claims for residential and commercial properties — including water, fire, storm, and more.

question2.questions: Do you replace my insurance company?
question2.answers: No. We don't sell insurance — we represent and guide you through the process to make sure your claim is handled properly.

question3.questions: I already filed a claim. Can you still help?
question3.answers: Yes. We can step in at any stage of your claim — even if it's already in progress or delayed.

question4.questions: Do you offer services for renters too?
question4.answers: Absolutely. We help renters understand their insurance coverage, deal with damage issues, or request approved repairs.

question5.questions: What areas of Quebec do you serve?
question5.answers: We provide service across Quebec, with bilingual advisors and a vetted network of contractors in all major regions.

question6.questions: Are your contractors licensed and insured?
question6.answers: Yes. All of our builders and repair partners are certified, fully insured, and meet Quebec's construction standards.

question7.questions: Can I use GAHQ even if I don't have an insurance claim?
question7.answers: Of course! We offer renovation and maintenance services for any homeowner — claim or no claim.

question8.questions: How do I know if my repair is covered by insurance?
question8.answers: We'll review your policy and help you determine if your issue qualifies before you file — saving you time and stress.

question9.questions: What types of renovations do you offer?
question9.answers: We handle everything from kitchen and bathroom upgrades to aging-in-place modifications and exterior work.

question10.answers: Create your free account online, or contact us to speak directly with a bilingual advisor.

question11.questions: Who can become a GAHQ member?
question11.answers: Anyone in Quebec — whether you own one property or manage dozens. Renters and first-time buyers are welcome too.

heroSection.title: ghashyamrao
heroSection.subTitle: From handling small repairs and home maintenance to managing large, insurable casualties, GAHQ makes owning property in Quebec a breeze.

feature1.value: When disaster strikes, call us first and let us handle everything.

feature2.value: Exclusive access to our network of vetted experts.

feature3.value: A GAHQ membership can save you thousands of dollars every year.

aboutSection.title: Who is Gestion d'Assurance-Habitation du Québec?
aboutSection.description: GAHQ is a Quebec-based company founded by experienced builders and licensed public claim adjusters. Our mission is simple: to give our members complete peace of mind when it comes to property ownership.

insuranceConsultations.title: Insurance Consultations & Claims Support
insuranceConsultations.description: Have a claim or not sure if you should even make one? We can help. GAHQ's certified advisors provide expert insurance consultation to guide you through damage insurance claims and questions. Whether you own one, several dozen or hundreds of properties, we make sure your claim is always handled fairly and nothing gets missed.
insuranceConsultations.button: Learn more about Insurance Claim Support

damageRepair.title: Disaster Restoration Services
damageRepair.description: Lets face it, after disaster strikes, you have other things to do than to manage a home renovation project. Our certified team of independent builders and contractors can work directly with your insurance company to handle the full scope of your claim-related repairs. Rest easy while GAHQ takes care of it all, start to finish, with quality you can count on.

projectHub.title: The GAHQ Projects Hub
projectHub.description: Not everything is an emergency — sometimes it's just time for an upgrade. The GAHQ Project Hub is also your direct line to certified renovation contractors across Quebec. Just share your project goals, and we'll match you with trusted professionals offering the best prices, products, and timelines.
projectHub.button: Learn more about the GAHQ Projects Hub

toolsServicesSection.title: Our Tools & Services
toolsServicesSection.description: Become a GAHQ member to get access to the ultimate ecosystem for Quebec property owners.

claimsAssistance.title: Licensed Public Claims Adjusters
claimsAssistance.description: We handle complex insurance claims and negotiations so you don't have to deal with your insurer directly.

certifiedServices.title: Certified Service Providers
certifiedServices.description: Get access to our extensive network of contractors and service providers across all of Quebec.

projectHub.title: GAHQ Project Hub
projectHub.description: Tell us a little about your project and let our team get you reliable estimates with clear, transparent pricing. No project is too large or too small.

askExperts.title: Ask the Experts Service
askExperts.description: Need some home maintenance advice? Get instant answers from a team of home maintenance & renovation experts.

discountsClub.title: The Discounts Club
discountsClub.description: Become a GAHQ member and unlock exclusive discounts from our hundreds of partners - not found anywhere else.

renoRewards.title: GAHQ-Dollars
renoRewards.description: An exclusive benefits program that gives you up to $1,000 annually towards future damages and repairs.

satisfactionGuarantee.title: 100% Satisfaction Guarantee
satisfactionGuarantee.description: We stand behind our service, because your trust means everything.

whoWeHelpSection.title: Who Can Become a GAHQ Member?
whoWeHelpSection.description: Whether you own one property, or a hundred. Whether you are renting or planning to purchase a new home. GAHQ simplifies home ownership.

homeowners.title: Homeowners
homeowners.description: We help homeowners navigate insurance claims, get repairs done right, and keep their property in top condition.

landlords.title: Landlords
landlords.description: From rental property repairs to claim disputes, we support landlords with reliable service and clear insurance guidance.

insights.title: Did you know?
insights.description: All you need to know about home insurance, renovations & repair costs.

cards.title: The average home price in Quebec reached $520,800 in March 2025 — up 8.4% year-over-year.
cards.description: According to Nesto's Housing Market Outlook, the cost of homeownership in Quebec continues to rise sharply. With higher purchase prices come greater risks and responsibilities. GAHQ helps protect your investment by ensuring your property is well maintained, insured properly, and repaired by certified professionals when needed.

cards.title: Annual Home Maintenance Costs Can Exceed $5,000
cards.description: Homeowners are advised to spend 1% of their home's value per year on upkeep — around $5,000 for an average Quebec home. As Scotiabank explains, ignoring regular maintenance can lead to costly issues down the line. GAHQ offers preventative maintenance plans tailored to Quebec's climate, helping homeowners avoid emergencies and stretch their investment with proactive care.

cards.title: Trust in Contractors Remains a Major Concern
cards.description: 70% of Canadians say they struggle to find trustworthy contractors for renovations over $5,000. A recent Fenestration Review survey shows a widespread lack of confidence in the renovation industry. GAHQ solves this with a vetted network of licensed builders and service providers — so our clients never have to gamble on quality or reliability.
cards.source: Apciq.ca - Survey on Buygin & Selling Intentions in Quebec

cards.title: Significant Portion of Homes Require Repairs
cards.description: Nearly 1 in 4 homes in Canada need minor repairs, and 7.3% require major work. Statistics Canada highlights the ongoing maintenance burden for Canadian homeowners. GAHQ helps reduce that burden by offering full-service repair, renovation, and inspection options — so issues are caught early and resolved right the first time.
cards.source: Statistics Canada – Household Repair Needs Report

cards.title: Home insurance claims can impact premiums for 5 to 7 years.
cards.description: As reported by Rates.ca, filing a home insurance claim in Canada can lead to increased premiums that persist for several years. This long-term financial impact underscores the importance of understanding your policy and exploring options like claim forgiveness programs. GAHQ assists clients in navigating the claims process to minimize potential premium hikes.

cards.title: Most Homeowners Are Underinsured
cards.description: Nearly 80% of Canadian homeowners are either uninsured or underinsured. The Insurance Business Canada site reports that a shocking number of Canadians lack full insurance protection — often without realizing it. That's where GAHQ steps in. Our AMF-certified advisors help you understand what your coverage actually includes and advocate for you when it matters most.

testimonials.title: With over 2,500 happy members, we must be doing something right.

slides.name: Émilie Charbonneau
slides.quote: As a first-time homeowner, I had no idea how confusing a home insurance claim could be. GAHQ made everything clear and handled my repair with total professionalism.

slides.name: Marc-André Desrosiers
slides.quote: After water damage in my rental unit, it took one call to GAHQ to handle everything from contacting my insurance company and scheduling trusted contractors on-site within the same day. Fast, reliable, and bilingual.

slides.name: Claudine Robitaille
slides.quote: Managing multiple buildings is tough — especially when claims drag on. GAHQ took over communication with my insurer and coordinated all the repairs. Their Project Portal is such a time and money saver. I never have to shop around anymore to find the best prices, products or services.

insurance.subTitle: Public Claim Adjusting Services
insurance.title: Insurance Consultations & Claims Support
insurance.description1: Navigating an insurance claim can be stressful — especially if you're unsure whether to file, what's actually covered, or how to deal with your insurer. That's why we created ClaimsCare™ by GAHQ — a tiered support system designed to simplify the process for Quebec homeowners, landlords, renters, and small business owners.
insurance.description2: Whether you're dealing with water damage, fire loss, storm-related structural issues, or flooding, we help you determine if your situation qualifies under your home or commercial insurance policy. Many policyholders don't fully understand their deductibles, exclusions, or what documentation is required — and that confusion can lead to delays, underpaid claims, or outright denials.
insurance.description3: GAHQ bridges the gap between property owners and insurers. Through ClaimsCare™, available in Basic, Pro, and Platinum tiers, we review your policy, advise you before you file, and advocate for you every step of the way — from damage inspection to claim escalation and contractor coordination.
insurance.description4: If your claim has been denied, delayed, or reduced, our team challenges it on your behalf. We also help gather supporting documents, write clear loss descriptions, and produce certified repair quotes through our contractor network.
insurance.description5: When your property is on the line, ClaimsCare™ ensures your claim is handled clearly, fairly, and fast — with real experts, not red tape.

content1.title: Damage Insurance Services
content1.description1: Let's face it — when your home or rental property is damaged, managing repairs shouldn't become your full-time job. GAHQ offers full-service damage insurance repair solutions across Quebec, specializing in both residential and commercial property restoration. Whether you're dealing with water damage, smoke and fire restoration, wind or hail damage, flood cleanup, or roof leaks, our certified contractors are ready to step in quickly and professionally.
content1.description2: We coordinate with your insurer, provide accurate insurance repair estimates, and handle everything from emergency board-ups and debris removal to structural rebuilding and finishing work. Our licensed builders, electricians, plumbers, and roofing professionals are vetted, insured, and familiar with Quebec's building codes — ensuring your repairs meet both insurance policy requirements and provincial regulations.
content1.description3: If you're overwhelmed by managing timelines, multiple quotes, or conflicting contractor opinions, GAHQ is your single point of contact. We reduce project delays, avoid cost overruns, and give you a dedicated claims repair project manager to ensure quality from start to finish.
content1.description4: Whether it's your primary residence, rental unit, or small business property, we restore your space with efficiency, transparency, and care — so you can get back to what matters.

content2.title: Insurance Claims Help
content2.description: Filing a home insurance claim can be overwhelming — especially if you're facing delays, denials, or unclear policy terms. GAHQ offers expert claims assistance for homeowners in Quebec, guiding you through the entire property damage claim process. Our AMF-certified advisors manage claim documentation, insurer communication, and settlement negotiations so you don't have to. Whether your issue involves water damage, fire loss, theft, or storm-related repairs, we help ensure your home insurance claim is handled fairly and efficiently. We also assist with appeals, claim follow-ups, and accurate repair estimates for faster approvals.

insurancePlansTable.subtitle: ClaimsCare™ Plans
insurancePlansTable.description: Choose the right coverage for your needs.
features: Insurance policy review & personalized coverage advice
Step-by-step assistance to open your claim
Re-evaluation of denied or underpaid claims
Referral to certified, trusted repair contractors
Full-service claim handling directly with your insurer
On-site visual assessment and claims consultation
Full damage documentation: losses, photos, invoices
Priority scheduling for repairs and rebuilds
Legal support and coordination if needed
Coverage for up to 10 properties under one account

maintenanceReno.title: Home Maintenance & Renovations
maintenanceReno.description1: Not everything is a disaster — sometimes your property just needs attention, updates, or a fresh start. GAHQ provides year-round home maintenance services and fully customized residential renovation solutions across Quebec. From small upgrades to major remodels, we help homeowners, landlords, and property managers maintain and improve their spaces with confidence.
maintenanceReno.description2: Our seasonal maintenance plans are designed to prevent problems before they start — including winterizing homes, gutter cleaning, HVAC tune-ups, and foundation checks. We also offer pre-sale inspections, exterior caulking, attic insulation upgrades, and emergency prevention work like sump pump testing and backup generator installation.
maintenanceReno.description3: Looking to renovate? Whether you need a kitchen remodel, bathroom renovation, basement finishing, or an open-concept layout redesign, GAHQ works with certified, insured contractors who deliver exceptional workmanship. We manage permits, timelines, and budgets — so you don't have to juggle multiple quotes or unreliable tradespeople.
maintenanceReno.description4: We serve clients across Quebec looking for reliable, full-service renovation and maintenance support — including first-time buyers, senior homeowners, and busy landlords. With GAHQ, you get trustworthy service, transparent pricing, and real peace of mind.
maintenanceReno.description5: Whether you're looking for small improvements or major renovations, GAHQ makes home upgrades stress-free. Our team of certified renovation specialists and maintenance professionals offers everything from minor home repairs to complete remodeling projects. We handle interior renovations, exterior improvements, and custom upgrades with attention to detail and full compliance with Quebec building standards. With flexible property maintenance plans, energy-efficient solutions, and licensed home improvement contractors, GAHQ helps homeowners, landlords, and first-time buyers maintain their homes while increasing long-term value and comfort.

content1.title: Certified Home Repair Services
content1.description: At GAHQ, we deliver certified home repair services with licensed contractors across Quebec. Our team specializes in insurance-approved repairs, including structural damage, roofing, electrical, and plumbing work. Whether you're dealing with post-claim reconstruction or general home improvements, we ensure every job meets provincial building standards and insurer expectations. Our vetted network of insured contractors guarantees quality workmanship, transparency, and clear communication — from estimate to final inspection. Serving homeowners, landlords, and small business owners, GAHQ takes the stress out of finding reliable professionals after a claim.

content2.title: Maintenance Plans
content2.description: Prevent costly emergencies with GAHQ's proactive home maintenance plans designed specifically for Quebec's unique climate. Our seasonal services include roof inspections, gutter cleaning, foundation checks, HVAC tune-ups, and winterization prep — all handled by certified local professionals. Whether you're a homeowner, landlord, or first-time buyer, our preventative maintenance programs help extend the life of your property and reduce the risk of insurance claims. GAHQ makes it easy to stay ahead of seasonal wear and tear with reliable, scheduled upkeep from trusted contractors.

content3.title: GAHQ Project Hub
content3.description: Looking to renovate? Start with the GAHQ Project Hub — your direct line to certified renovation contractors across Quebec. Just share your project goals, and we'll match you with trusted professionals offering the best prices, products, and timelines. Whether you're planning a kitchen remodel, bathroom upgrade, basement finish, or full-home renovation, our portal simplifies the process with vetted experts, transparent quotes, and dedicated project support. No project is too big or too small. Save time, avoid overspending, and get the quality your home deserves.

content4.title: GAHQ Reno Hotline
content4.description: Have a question about home maintenance or renovations? Our Ask an Expert feature connects you directly with certified professionals across Quebec — no appointment needed. Whether you're wondering about seasonal upkeep, minor repairs, renovation costs, or insurance-related damage, our team offers clear, helpful answers you can trust. From first-time homeowners to experienced landlords, GAHQ gives you expert insight without the guesswork. Skip the online forums and DIY confusion — get reliable advice, fast.

content5.title: GAHQ Exclusive Discounts
content5.description: When you become a GAHQ member, you unlock more than just support — you gain access to exclusive discounts from our trusted network of Quebec-based suppliers, home service providers, and renovation partners. From building materials and furniture to contractor rates and home systems, our preferred pricing helps you save on every project. These deals are only available through GAHQ — you won't find them anywhere else online or in-store. Whether you're planning a renovation or ongoing maintenance, membership pays for itself.

hero.title: Membership Benefits & Exclusive Support
hero.description: Discover all the exclusive benefits and services available to GAHQ members. From project management tools to expert consultations, we provide everything you need for successful home renovations — a tiered support system designed to simplify the process for Quebec homeowners, landlords, renters, and small business owners.

projectsHub.title: Projects Hub
projectsHub.description: Looking to renovate? Start with the GAHQ Project Hub — your direct line to certified renovation contractors across Quebec. Just share your project goals, and we'll match you with trusted professionals offering the best prices, products, and timelines. Whether you're planning a kitchen remodel, bathroom upgrade, basement finish, or full-home renovation, our portal simplifies the process with vetted experts, transparent quotes, and dedicated project support. No project is too big or too small. Save time, avoid overspending, and get the quality your home deserves.
projectsHub.bridgeDescription: GAHQ bridges the gap between property owners and certified contractors. Through the Project Hub™, available in Basic, Pro, and Platinum tiers, we review your project, advise you before you start, and support you every step of the way — from initial inspection to contractor coordination.
projectsHub.guaranteeDescription: When your property is on the line, the Project Hub™ ensures your project is handled clearly, fairly, and fast — with real experts, not red tape.

satisfactionGuarantee.title: GAHQ Satisfaction Guarantee
satisfactionGuarantee.description: At GAHQ, your satisfaction is our priority. If you're not fully satisfied with our services, we commit to resolving any issues or disputes to the best of our ability. If we're unable to reach a fair resolution, you may be eligible for a full refund of your membership fee.
satisfactionGuarantee.engagementDescription: Our guarantee isn't automatic — it's based on real engagement and accountability. We stand behind our service, because your trust means everything.

discountsHub.title: Discounts Hub
discountsHub.description: When you become a GAHQ member, you unlock more than just support — you gain access to exclusive discounts from our trusted network of Quebec-based suppliers, home service providers, and renovation partners. From building materials and furniture to contractor rates and home systems, our preferred pricing helps you save on every project. These deals are only available through GAHQ — you won't find them anywhere else online or in-store. Whether you're planning a renovation or ongoing maintenance, membership pays for itself.

renoRewards.title: GAHQ-Dollars™
renoRewards.description: As a GAHQ Prestige member, you deserve more than just support — you deserve real savings. That's why we created GAHQ-Dollars™, an exclusive program that gives you up to $1,000 in annual credit toward any future repair or rebuild projects. It's our way of rewarding your loyalty while helping you protect and grow the value of your property.
renoRewards.benefitsDescription: Use your credits to offset labor costs, materials, or bundled service packages — with no paperwork, no points to track — just direct savings that integrate seamlessly with your membership.
renoRewards.closingDescription: GAHQ-Dollars™ makes it easier to invest in your home — with benefits that truly pay off.

askExpert.title: Ask an Expert
askExpert.description: Have a question about home maintenance or renovations? Our Ask an Expert feature connects you directly with certified professionals across Quebec — no appointment needed. Whether you're wondering about seasonal upkeep, minor repairs, renovation costs, or insurance-related damage, our team offers clear, helpful answers you can trust. From first-time homeowners to experienced landlords, GAHQ gives you expert insight without the guesswork. Skip the online forums and DIY confusion — get reliable advice, fast.

ourMembers.subTitle: Who We Help
ourMembers.title: GAHQ Members & Community Support
ourMembers.description1: GAHQ serves a diverse community of property owners, managers, and tenants across Quebec. We provide tailored solutions for every type of member, ensuring everyone gets the support they need.
ourMembers.description2: From first-time homeowners to experienced landlords, from small business owners to senior citizens - we understand that each member has unique needs and challenges when it comes to property management, insurance claims, and home maintenance.
ourMembers.description3: Our comprehensive support system is designed to simplify the complex world of property ownership and rental management, providing expert guidance every step of the way.

content1.title: GAHQ is for Homeowners
content1.description: For homeowners in Quebec, dealing with home insurance claims, unexpected repairs, or regular maintenance can feel overwhelming. That's where GAHQ comes in. We guide you through every step of the insurance claim process, ensure repairs are completed by certified professionals, and offer seasonal maintenance plans to help you protect your investment long-term. Whether you've experienced water damage, a roof leak, or just want peace of mind, GAHQ provides trusted support tailored to your needs. No more chasing contractors or navigating insurance alone — we're your all-in-one partner in homeownership support.

content2.title: GAHQ is for landlords
content2.description: Managing rental properties comes with its own set of challenges — from unexpected repairs to insurance claim disputes. GAHQ helps landlords across Quebec handle both smoothly. We coordinate tenant-related damage repairs, provide guidance on landlord insurance claims, and connect you with certified contractors who respect your timelines and your budget. Whether you own a single duplex or multiple rental units, our experts help you minimize downtime, maintain property value, and stay compliant with provincial standards. From inspections to emergency repairs, GAHQ is your partner in stress-free property management.

content3.title: GAHQ is for Small Businesses
content3.description: For small business owners in Quebec, protecting your commercial property is critical to staying operational. GAHQ provides expert support for business insurance claims, damage restoration, and preventative maintenance — all handled by licensed professionals. Whether your storefront suffered fire damage, water leaks, or vandalism, we coordinate the entire repair process while communicating directly with your insurer. Our team works quickly to minimize downtime, keep your business safe, and ensure code compliance. With GAHQ, you get fast repairs, clear insurance guidance, and reliable service — so you can stay focused on your business.

content4.title: GAHQ is for First Time Buyers
content4.description: Buying your first home in Quebec can feel overwhelming — especially when it comes to understanding insurance, managing repairs, or choosing reliable contractors. GAHQ simplifies homeownership for first-time buyers with expert advice on insurance coverage, damage claims, maintenance plans, and renovation options. We help you avoid costly mistakes and ensure you're fully supported at every step, from policy questions to post-purchase improvements. No guesswork, no jargon — just honest, practical help designed for new homeowners.

content5.title: GAHQ is for Renters
content5.description: Many renters don't realize they need insurance until it's too late. GAHQ helps Quebec tenants understand their renter's insurance coverage, file damage claims, and request approved repairs from landlords. Whether it's a leak, mold, or fire damage, our advisors help you navigate the process and protect your belongings. We also assist with insurance paperwork and conflict resolution when needed. Renting shouldn't mean being left in the dark — GAHQ ensures you know your rights and get the support you deserve.

content6.title: GAHQ is for Seniors
content6.description: As we age, dealing with insurance, repairs, and renovations can become more challenging. GAHQ provides respectful, step-by-step support tailored for senior homeowners in Quebec. We offer clear assistance with insurance claims, help coordinate trusted repair and maintenance professionals, and specialize in aging-in-place renovations like walk-in showers and safety upgrades. Our team ensures nothing is missed and no one is taken advantage of. Whether you live alone or with family, GAHQ makes homeownership easier, safer, and less stressful for seniors.

faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.question1: Can I change my plan anytime?
faq.answer1: Yes, you can upgrade or downgrade your plan at any time. Changes will be reflected in your next billing cycle.
faq.answer2: Yes, we offer a 30-day free trial for all paid plans. You can cancel anytime during the trial period.
faq.question3: What payment methods do you accept?
faq.answer3: We accept all major credit cards, debit cards, and PayPal. All payments are processed securely.
faq.answer4: Yes, you can cancel your subscription at any time from your account settings. No cancellation fees apply.

interfaceLanguage.title: Interface Language
interfaceLanguage.description: Choose the language for menus, buttons, and other interface elements

reloadDialog.title: Language Updated Successfully! 🎉
reloadDialog.description: To fully apply the language changes throughout the entire application, please reload the page. This will ensure all interface elements display in your selected language.

notifications.title: Notifications
notifications.accountDesc: We will send you notifications to inform you of any updates and/or changes as events occur for you or your business. Select which notifications you want to receive below:
notifications.accountingDesc: When accounting and bookkeeping transactions need your attention.
notifications.salesDesc: When relevant sales-related activity occurs such as when an invoice is overdue.
notifications.paymentsDesc: When you've been paid or need to be notified to keep your payments operating.
notifications.purchasesDesc: When receipt exports are ready and when receipts you've emailed need to be posted into accounting.
notifications.billsDesc: When you need to be reminded of upcoming and/or late bills.

logout.title: Confirm Logout
logout.description: Are you sure you want to logout? You will need to login again to access your account.

whoWeHelp.title: Who can become a GAHQ member?
whoWeHelp.description: GAHQ membership is open to anyone in Quebec looking for expert support with property maintenance, renovations, or insurance claims. Whether you own one property or manage dozens, whether you're renting, buying your first home, or planning upgrades — we're here to help. Our services are designed for homeowners, first-time buyers, renters, landlords, and commercial property owners. If you value reliable contractors, insurance expertise, and stress-free home management, GAHQ is for you. Join thousands of members across Quebec who count on us for professional support and exclusive benefits.

homeowners.title: GAHQ is for Homeowners
homeowners.description: For homeowners in Quebec, dealing with home insurance claims, unexpected repairs, or regular maintenance can feel overwhelming. That's where GAHQ comes in. We guide you through every step of the insurance claim process, ensure repairs are completed by certified professionals, and offer seasonal maintenance plans to help you protect your investment long-term. Whether you've experienced water damage, a roof leak, or just want peace of mind, GAHQ provides trusted support tailored to your needs. No more chasing contractors or navigating insurance alone — we're your all-in-one partner in homeownership support.

landlords.title: GAHQ is for landlords

We coordinate tenant-related damage repairs, provide guidance on landlord insurance claims, and connect you with certified contractors who respect your timelines and your budget. Whether you own a single duplex or multiple rental units, our experts help you minimize downtime, maintain property value, and stay compliant with provincial standards. From inspections to emergency repairs, GAHQ is your partner in stress-free property management.

smallBusiness.title: GAHQ is for Small Businesses
smallBusiness.description: For small business owners in Quebec, protecting your commercial property is critical to staying operational. GAHQ provides expert support for business insurance claims, damage restoration, and preventative maintenance — all handled by licensed professionals. Whether your storefront suffered fire damage, water leaks, or vandalism, we coordinate the entire repair process while communicating directly with your insurer. Our team works quickly to minimize downtime, keep your business safe, and ensure code compliance. With GAHQ, you get fast repairs, clear insurance guidance, and reliable service — so you can stay focused on your business.

firstTimeBuyers.title: GAHQ is for First Time Buyers
firstTimeBuyers.description: Buying your first home in Quebec can feel overwhelming — especially when it comes to understanding insurance, managing repairs, or choosing reliable contractors. GAHQ simplifies homeownership for first-time buyers with expert advice on insurance coverage, damage claims, maintenance plans, and renovation options. We help you avoid costly mistakes and ensure you're fully supported at every step, from policy questions to post-purchase improvements. No guesswork, no jargon — just honest, practical help designed for new homeowners.

renters.description: Many renters don't realize they need insurance until it's too late. GAHQ helps Quebec tenants understand their renter's insurance coverage, file damage claims, and request approved repairs from landlords. Whether it's a leak, mold, or fire damage, our advisors help you navigate the process and protect your belongings. We also assist with insurance paperwork and conflict resolution when needed. Renting shouldn't mean being left in the dark — GAHQ ensures you know your rights and get the support you deserve.
